snippet.title: HALLOWEEN SPECIAL: Crypt of Medea walkthrough (Apple II - Sir-tech)
snippet.description:
Crypt of Medea (http://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/crypt-of-medea) was a horror graphics adventure game published by Sir-Tech in 1983 for the Apple ][. I think it was one of the first computer games with graphic violence.The player woke up inside the Crypt of Medea and can't recall how he ended up there. He needs to find a way out of the crypt filled with horrible creatures and danger. Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com
Walkthrough - www.asimov.net (Douglas Cameron), The Book of Adventure Games (Kim Schuette)
